Title: Extends the authorization of the county of Rensselaer to impose an additional one percent sales and compensating use tax
Summary: Extends the authorization of the county of Rensselaer to impose an additional one percent sales and compensating use tax.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to extending the authorization of the county of Rensselaer to impose an additional one percent sales and compensating use tax
